verses.text: \w For|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* rest \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w pray|strong="G2443"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* beseech \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w as|strong="G2531"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w have|strong="G4052"\w* \w received|strong="G3880"\w* \w from|strong="G3844"\w* \w us|strong="G1722"\w*, \w how|strong="G4459"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w ought|strong="G1163"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w walk|strong="G4043"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w please|strong="G0700"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w so|strong="G2443"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w would|strong="G2962"\w* \w walk|strong="G4043"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w may|strong="G2532"\w* \w abound|strong="G4052"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w more|strong="G3123"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* precepts \w I|strong="G1223"\w* \w have|strong="G3588"\w* \w given|strong="G1325"\w* \w to|strong="G1325"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w will|strong="G2307"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w your|strong="G3588"\w* \w sanctification|strong="G0038"\w*; \w that|strong="G3778"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w should|strong="G2316"\w* \w abstain|strong="G0568"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w fornication|strong="G4202"\w*;

\w That|strong="G1438"\w* \w every|strong="G1538"\w* \w one|strong="G1538"\w* \w of|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w should|strong="G2532"\w* \w know|strong="G1492"\w* how \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w possess|strong="G2932"\w* \w his|strong="G1438"\w* \w vessel|strong="G4632"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w sanctification|strong="G0038"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* honour:

\w Not|strong="G3361"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w passion|strong="G3806"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w lust|strong="G1939"\w*, \w like|strong="G2509"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w* \w that|strong="G2316"\w* \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G3778"\w* \w no|strong="G3361"\w* \w man|strong="G3778"\w* overreach, \w nor|strong="G2532"\w* circumvent \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* business: \w because|strong="G1360"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w is|strong="G3778"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w avenger|strong="G1558"\w* \w of|strong="G2962"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w*, \w as|strong="G2531"\w* \w we|strong="G3778"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* told \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w before|strong="G1722"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w testified|strong="G1263"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* hath \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w called|strong="G2564"\w* \w us|strong="G1722"\w* unto \w uncleanness|strong="G0167"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* unto \w sanctification|strong="G0038"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="G5105"\w*, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G0846"\w* despiseth \w these|strong="G3588"\w* \w things|strong="G0846"\w*, despiseth \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* hath \w given|strong="G1325"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w us|strong="G1325"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w as|strong="G1519"\w* touching \w the|strong="G3588"\w* charity \w of|strong="G4012"\w* brotherhood, \w we|strong="G1161"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w need|strong="G5532"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w write|strong="G1125"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w yourselves|strong="G0846"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* learned \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w God|strong="G0846"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w love|strong="G0025"\w* \w one|strong="G0240"\w* \w another|strong="G0240"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w indeed|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w* towards \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w Macedonia|strong="G3109"\w*. \w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w we|strong="G2532"\w* \w entreat|strong="G3870"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w that|strong="G3956"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w abound|strong="G4052"\w* \w more|strong="G3123"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* that \w you|strong="G5210"\w* use \w your|strong="G2532"\w* endeavour \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w quiet|strong="G2270"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* that \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w do|strong="G4238"\w* \w your|strong="G2532"\w* \w own|strong="G2398"\w* business, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w work|strong="G2038"\w* \w with|strong="G2532"\w* \w your|strong="G2532"\w* \w own|strong="G2398"\w* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w*, \w as|strong="G2531"\w* \w we|strong="G2532"\w* \w commanded|strong="G3853"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* that \w you|strong="G5210"\w* walk honestly towards \w them|strong="G3853"\w* that \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w without|strong="G2532"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* that \w you|strong="G5210"\w* want nothing \w of|strong="G5495"\w* any manâ€™s.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w we|strong="G2532"\w* \w will|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3367"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w you|strong="G2532"\w* ignorant, brethren, concerning \w them|strong="G2443"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* asleep, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w you|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3367"\w* sorrowful, \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w as|strong="G2532"\w* \w others|strong="G3588"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w no|strong="G3367"\w* hope.

\w For|strong="G4012"\w* \w if|strong="G2443"\w* \w we|strong="G2532"\w* believe \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2532"\w* \w died|strong="G2837"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* rose \w again|strong="G2532"\w*; \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w so|strong="G2443"\w* \w them|strong="G4012"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* slept through \w Jesus|strong="G2532"\w*, \w will|strong="G2309"\w* God bring \w with|strong="G2532"\w* \w him|strong="G2532"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w this|strong="G3779"\w* \w we|strong="G1487"\w* \w say|strong="G1223"\w* unto \w you|strong="G1487"\w* \w in|strong="G2316"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* word \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2316"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w we|strong="G1487"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* alive, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* remain unto \w the|strong="G3588"\w* coming \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2316"\w*, \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G2532"\w* prevent \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* slept.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w himself|strong="G1519"\w* \w shall|strong="G3778"\w* \w come|strong="G5348"\w* down \w from|strong="G3361"\w* heaven \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w commandment|strong="G3056"\w*, \w and|strong="G2962"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* voice \w of|strong="G3056"\w* an archangel, \w and|strong="G2962"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* trumpet \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w God|strong="G3004"\w*: \w and|strong="G2962"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w dead|strong="G2837"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w are|strong="G3778"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G2962"\w*, \w shall|strong="G3778"\w* rise \w first|strong="G5348"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G2532"\w* \w we|strong="G2532"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* alive, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w left|strong="G0575"\w*, \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* taken \w up|strong="G0450"\w* \w together|strong="G1722"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* clouds \w to|strong="G2532"\w* meet \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w into|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w air|strong="G3772"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w so|strong="G2532"\w* \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w we|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* always \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.
Wherefore, comfort ye \w one|strong="G3588"\w* another \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w these|strong="G3588"\w* \w words|strong="G2532"\w*.
